title: LeBlanc Viability
body:
LeBlanc doesn't bring anything to the table anymore after her silence removal, her damage is irrelavent because OPs like Syndra and Kat can match it, and it is 100x harder to do anything in lane now.
#sadLBplayer

replies.body: I call bull%%%%. She has godtier mobility and can dive 5 to make a pick on ANYTHING without a banshees up. Syndra seems left behind but maybe that is just my games.
she still has huge outplay potential and big di.ck mobility
